snippet.title: Scallion RPG Trailer 1 | FuminoStudio
snippet.description:
Scallion RPG Trailer 1 | FuminoStudio
(This trailer shows early build of the game and is not final product)

This game will be released on Mobile Devices in December 2024.

==================================

Description:
Scallion RPG is a Monster Taming RPG, where you travel the world collect Scallions and battle by transforming into them. With three party members transforming into Scallions at once for a 3v3 battle, your journey is going to be fun and exciting.

Your main goal is explore all region and collect 5 Artifact from Tower Trails and become the ultimate Scallion Master.

You will come along many NPCs in your journey which can join you in and help you in achieving your goal.

==================================

Support this project on Ko-Fi https://ko-fi.com/fuminostudio

Follow on Twitter @ ScallionRPG
https://x.com/ScallionRPG?t=kiXbLWGtXdItYGDQbyqALw&s=09

==================================

#game #rpg #pixelart #indiegame #monstertaming #GDevelop #monstercatching #turnbased #scallionrpg #monstertamingdirect
